copy.its_free: An account is free, now and forever. Sign up to get started.
copy.enter_email: Enter your email, we'll send a reset link.
copy.its_free_2: It's free and always will be. All you need to do to get started is provide a valid email address, choose a username, and set your password.
copy.i_read: I have read and agree to the
copy.learn_about_title: Let's build a better future for music together.
copy.community_body: Talk to the team on our #community Slack channel. We are always here to talk about our tools & listen to your feedback.
copy.feature_header0: All your data at a glance.
copy.feature_body0: Just log in to check your sales, mailing list signups, and more. All right at your fingertips.
copy.feature_header1: CASH music x Run The Jewels.
copy.feature_body1: Our tools are made for scale. They were used to release RTJ2, so from your first fan to your millionth, we've got you covered.
copy.feature_body2: Sell digital and physical in one cart, no cuts, no middleman, using your own Stripe or PayPal account on your site.
